body_html:
It turns out that jupyter notebook is not a good place to do multiprocessing. Setting the start method to 'spawn' or 'forkserver' for some reason stops even the most basic multiprocessing from working.

I don't personally own a GPU so would highly appreciate if anyone could try to reproduce OP's original code or give any comments on this.

body:
It turns out that jupyter notebook is not a good place to do multiprocessing. Setting the start method to 'spawn' or 'forkserver' for some reason stops even the most basic multiprocessing from working.

I don't personally own a GPU so would highly appreciate if anyone could try to reproduce OP's original code or give any comments on this.
